                      How to use Celo Engage Hub?

                      Follow these quick steps to get the most out of the hub.

                      STEP 1

                      Connect your wallet

                      Use the top-right Connect Wallet button to link your Celo wallet.

                      STEP 2

                      Explore the Celo ecosystem

                      Browse Celo tools, bridges, exchanges, mini apps and official links in one place.

                      STEP 3

                      Take on-chain actions

                      Use GM, Deploy and Donate to interact with contracts and support the community.

                      STEP 4

                      Share your journey

                      Cast about your experience on Farcaster and invite others to join.

                      Why Celo Engage Hub?

                      A curated, on-chain-friendly space built for the Celo and Farcaster ecosystem.

                      CURATED CELO EXPERIENCE

                      Curated Celo experience

                      Official links, tools, bridges, exchanges and mini apps curated in one place.

                      ON-CHAIN ENGAGEMENT

                      On-chain engagement

                      GM, Deploy and Donate flows make it easy to interact with contracts and support builders.

                      FARCASTER-NATIVE

                      Farcaster-native mindset

                      Designed to highlight Celo projects that live close to Farcaster and mini apps.

                      Who is Celo Engage Hub for?

                      Tailored experiences for everyone exploring or building on Celo.

                      FOR USERS

                      Explore Celo in a simple way

                      • Discover Celo tools and mini apps from one hub.
                      • Send your first on-chain GM or small donation.
                      • Follow official links to stay safe and up to date.

                      FOR BUILDERS

                      Showcase and grow your project

                      • List your Celo mini apps and tools where users can easily find them.
                      • Use GM, Deploy and Donate flows as simple entry points to your contracts.
                      • Connect with the wider Celo and Farcaster builder community.

                      Connect Wallet
